plot: CIA Agent Walter Adams was kidnapped while he was undercover on a secret mission. He wakes up in the middle of nowhere tied to a tree, and tries to escape fighting to stay alive.
title: Beyond the Tree
plot_es: CIA Agent Walter Adams was kidnapped while he was undercover on a secret mission. He wakes up in the middle of nowhere tied to a tree, and tries to escape fighting to stay alive.
plot_en: CIA Agent Walter Adams was kidnapped while he was undercover on a secret mission. He wakes up in the middle of nowhere tied to a tree, and tries to escape fighting to stay alive.
